data.title: Seminole County Public Schools
data.text:
General Information | Before/ After Care | Tax Information

KidZone & Beyond offers before and after school child care, afterschool enrichment and summer camp. The program is designed to enrich children's lives educationally, socially, culturally, emotionally, physically, and to provide a safe and familiar setting for pre-kindergarten and elementary school children. We focus on meeting the needs of working parents by offering a safe, accessible, and affordable program that is school based. We will achieve these goals through activities that allow for creativity, discovery, and exploration.

General Information

Our core values are guided by professional conduct, mutual respect, high performance and citizenship. We are driven each day to provide high quality childcare that fosters creativity, social growth, and allows children to expand upon their imagination.

Students should be able to function independently in a 25:1 student/child-care provider ratio. Pre-kindergarten students must be 4 years of age by September 1 of the incoming school year and fully potty-trained. We take pride in providing a family-friendly program that strives to enrich the life of each child. In collaboration with all of our parents, we encourage and motivate each child to AIM for Excellence!

For more information, please email us at [email protected].

Address:

239 Rinehart Rd.

Lake Mary, FL 32746

2024-2025 Before and After Care

View our 2024-2025 School Year Registration information.

Please be advised that KidZone & Beyond is accepting registration applications for the waitlist only. At this time, schools do not have the availability to add new students. If/when space becomes available throughout the school year, you will be contacted and offered the opportunity to accept the placement.

In addition, the following locations are not able to accept any registrations for the waitlist:

Carillon Elementary, Crystal Lake Elementary, Lake Mary Elementary, Keeth Elementary, Rainbow Elementary, Wekiva Elementary, and Wilson Elementary.

Tax Information

Please follow the steps below to obtain your Tax Information from Jan. 2022 - Present:

Hello KidZone & Beyond families,

You can access your payment information by logging in to msbactivities.com from a computer and clicking the Forms tile. You will NOT be able to get the information through the APP. You will find a payment history report there. If you used more than one username and password, you would have to login with each to get a complete report.

Also, payment information is available to print from the MSB website. You will NOT be able to get the information through the APP. Please see the steps below on how to obtain your Tax Information.

Tax ID: 59-6000855

MY SCHOOL BUCKS

Log onto myschoolbucks.com and follow the steps below:

1. Click “School Store” in the upper right-hand corner of the site.

2. Click "Scheduled Payments."

3. Click “Recent Payments.”

4. Click the “Download” button.

5. Select “Previous Calendar Year."

6. Click “Export.”
